flowName: counts compare to validate inserted and updated data
flowDesc: counts compare to validate inserted and updated data

inserted_updated_sql.sql:
SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.metrics_1M__g WHERE id < 100) + 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.metrics_1M__g WHERE id > 100) AS total_count 
FROM dbo.metrics_1M__g
inserted_updated_sql.name: inserted_updated_sql
